mapper.insert: MERGE INTO page_log p USING (SELECT #{memId} AS MEM_ID, #{pageName} AS PAGE_NAME FROM dual) new_data ON (p.MEM_ID = new_data.MEM_ID AND p.PAGE_NAME = new_data.PAGE_NAME) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET p.VISIT_COUNT = p.VISIT_COUNT + 1, p.LAST_VISIT_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (MEM_ID, PAGE_NAME, VISIT_COUNT, LAST_VISIT_DATE) VALUES (#{memId}, #{pageName}, 1, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT MEM_ID, PAGE_NAME, VISIT_COUNT, TO_CHAR(LAST_VISIT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_VISIT_DATE FROM page_log WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} AND MEM_ID != 'admin' order by visit_count desc
SELECT PAGE_NAME, sum(VISIT_COUNT) as visit_count FROM page_log WHERE MEM_ID != 'admin' group by page_name order by visit_count desc
SELECT Distinct(MEM_ID) FROM page_log WHERE MEM_ID != 'admin'
SELECT distinct(page_name) FROM page_log WHERE MEM_ID != 'admin'
SELECT mem_id, visit_count FROM page_log WHERE 1 = 1 AND page_name = #{pageName} AND MEM_ID != 'admin' order by visit_count desc
SELECT mem_id, sum(visit_count) as VISIT_COUNT FROM page_log WHERE mem_id != 'admin' group by mem_id order by visit_count desc
